_header: The wheel of Fortune who can hold
Title(s): ‘Farewell the best that euer was borne’
_description: ‘Farewell the best that euer was borne’ — three stanzas rhyme royal

BLRoyApp58.First Lines:
The whele of fortune who can holdstablyschyd style yn one
                    Degre…
BLRoyApp58.Last Lines:
…Now hard to holdnow hard to fallIoyus over
                    evyn& sorow on the morne[torn]best[?] þat euer was
                    borne

Flügel,  Ewald. 
             “Liedersammlungen des XVI Jahrhunderts, Besonders aus der Zeit Heinrichs
